price: Yεde nokorε na εbͻͻ ͻsoro ne asaase ne deε εwͻ ne mmienu mfinfii no. Nokorε sε Dͻnhwere no reba, enti (Nkͻmhyεni), bu w’ani gu (ͻhaw ne ateeteε a boniayεfoͻ no de redi mo no) so wͻ ahummͻborͻ ne bͻne fafri mu.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَأٓتِيَةٞۖ فَٱصۡفَحِ ٱلصَّفۡحَ ٱلۡجَمِيلَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqnā al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā illā bil-ḥaqi wa-inna al-sāʿata laātiyatun fa-iṣ'faḥi al-ṣafḥa al-jamīla
